greeting: G'day! I'll guide you through a short set of topics to learn more about you.

topics.title: About You
topics.systemPrompt: Collect the user's full name, role/title, and city. Be friendly and conversational. Extract these fields from the conversation.
topics.userIntro: Let's start with some basics about you. What is your full name, role, and city?

topics.title: Professional Background
topics.systemPrompt: Learn about the user's company, years of experience, and industry. Be conversational and ask follow-up questions if needed.
topics.userIntro: Great! Now tell me about your professional background.

topics.title: Goals & Interests
topics.systemPrompt: Understand the user's career goals and professional interests. Be encouraging and supportive.
topics.userIntro: Finally, let's talk about your goals and interests.
